document.full_text: p.t. barnum first took to the rails with his self-proclaimed 'greatest show on earth' in 1872, and trains still keep the ringling brothers and barnum & bailey circus on the move.
document.title: riding the rails to the circus ring
lines_and_colors: p.t. barnum first took to the rails with his self-proclaimed 'greatest show on earth' in 1872, and trains still keep the ringling brothers and barnum & bailey circus on the move.
